short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Development tool allowing quick login to stored partitions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pricefx Browser Extension is a tool for Google Chrome and should work in Chromium based browsers.

Features:
• Quick login
• Auto-launch 
• Environment highlighting
• Showcase hiding (ad-block)
• Password configuration encryption
